document_data.name: Laylee
document_data.mainbody: '''Laylee''' was a [[kobold]] from the [[Dragon's Rest]] cloister in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Laylee served as a helper for [[Myla]], a kobold tinkerer.
document_data.Personality: Laylee had an inquisitive nature and a flair for tools and building.
document_data.History:
Laylee once handled Myla's [[Alchemist's fire|alchemical fire]] and caused an incident in the [[Dragon's Rest#Kitchen|cloister kitchen]]. Myla prohibited her from using it again.

''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1481}},{{Stormwreck-time}} Laylee shared with three other kobolds a small [[Dragon's Rest#Monastic cells|monastic cell]] in the Dragon's Rest cloister cut into the cliff face. Each of the four slept on individual hammocks. Just like all the other kobolds, she worked at night because of their sunlight sensitivity.
